This is my first blog post. I'll be sharing insights on technology, leadership, and building products.

# Welcome to My Blog

Hello and welcome! I'm Pongsiri Pisut, and this is my personal blog where I share my thoughts on technology, leadership, and product development.

## What to Expect

Here, you'll find posts about:

- **Technology & AI**: Insights on emerging technologies, AI integration, and software architecture
- **Leadership**: Lessons learned from leading teams and organizations
- **Product Development**: Best practices for building products that users love
- **Community Building**: Experiences from leading the Thai Programmer Association

## Stay Connected

Feel free to connect with me on [LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com/in/savepong) or check out my projects on [GitHub](https://github.com/savepong).

Thanks for reading, and stay tuned for more content!
